text: Chen (),Diogenes Laërtius, 1.106. or Chenai (Χῆναι), was a town and polis (city-state) of Oetaea in ancient Thessaly. It is mentioned by Pausanias. Its location is on Mount Oeta. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Thessalian city- states Category:Oetaea Category:Mount Oeta
title: Chen (Thessaly)
